H0.text: Saloth Sar was the real name of which infamous dictator. Idi Amin

H1.text: Saloth Sar was the real name of which infamous dictator. Saddam Hussein

H2.text: Saloth Sar was the real name of which infamous dictator. Joseph Stalin

H3.text: Saloth Sar was the real name of which infamous dictator. Polpot

A4.text: Pol Pot (born Saloth Sâr; 19 May 1925 – 15 April 1998) was a Cambodian politician, revolutionary, and dictator who ruled the communist state of Democratic Kampuchea from 1975 until his overthrow in 1979.
